analysis.description:
CurrenXToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/15/0xbf510c045eeb72cfdefd985e351e32d38df87a6d.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xbf510c045eeb72cfdefd985e351e32d38df87a6d.sol#223-235)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xbf510c045eeb72cfdefd985e351e32d38df87a6d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0xbf510c045eeb72cfdefd985e351e32d38df87a6d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xbf510c045eeb72cfdefd985e351e32d38df87a6d.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
